DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects VPN-related events from devices running OpenVPN.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: Charon general log sending retransmit
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([\w.]+) (charon: )(\d+)\[IKE\] sending retransmit (\d+) of request message ID (\d+), seq (\d+)
FastPattern.pattern: charon: \d+\[IKE\] sending retransmit \d+ of request message
charon: \d+\[IKE\] initiating Main Mode IKE_SA \S+ to [\d.]+

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: Charon ip appeared/disappeared on/from interface
ServiceStart: OpenVPN service start with WEB OUT
ServiceInfo: OpenVPN OVPN OUT initial packet
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([\w.]+) openvpnas: \[-\] OVPN (\d+) OUT: ['|"](\w\w\w \w\w\w \d\d \d\d:\d\d:\d\d \d\d\d\d) (.+) (TLS: Initial packet from \[(.+)\]([\d.]+):([\d]+)(.+))['|"]

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: OpenVPN OVPN OUT VERIFY OK
ServiceInfo: OpenVPN OVPN OUT peer info
ServiceInfo: OpenVPN OVPN OUT configuration on ip
ServiceWarning: OpenVPN License manager: exception with license file
FastPattern.pattern: openvpnas: \[-\] License manager: exception with license file

FastField.defaultValue: License manager: exception with license file

FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([\w.]+) openvpnas: \[(.+)?\] Resolver added \('([\d.]+)', (\d+)\) to server list

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: OpenVPN max open files set to
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([\w.]+) openvpnas: \[(.+)?\] Max open files set to \((\d+), (\d+)\)
FastPattern.pattern: openvpnas: \[.+?\] Max open files set to
